meanings.sent1: He felt dweebier than his friends at the comic convention.
meanings.sent2: The glasses made him look even dweebier than usual.
meanings.sent3: His dweebier outfit was a hit at the nerdy party.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of cool kids, he stood out as the dweebier one.
meanings.sent5: The dweebier character in the movie was everyone's favorite.

meanings.sent1: She found the dweebier glasses to be quite stylish.
meanings.sent2: The dweebier students preferred studying over partying.
meanings.sent3: His dweebier jokes always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dweebier side of town had the best comic book store.
meanings.sent5: The dweebier group of friends bonded over their love for science fiction.
